item.description:
All liberty lovers are cordially invited to the Libertarian Party of New Hampshire's annual picnic.
Click on website link for directions

When: Sunday, July 20th, 12:00PM - 4:00PM
Where: Burning Porcupine Festival grounds, Grafton NH
Why: because liberty matters... also, Libertarians will take any excuse to drink beer

The festivities will include
- BBQ Bacon_by_danniep
- beer occasion14
- frisbee
- tug o' war over a leech-laden lagoon
- "Nest Egg" Toss - brought to you by the fine folks at the Federal Reserve and http://www.nellienest...
- Libertarian trash talk blahblah
- hot freedom-loving chicks in halter tops* Shocked
- Victory 2008 Liberty Firearm Raffle - tickets available at the picnic and in advance online at http://www.lpnh.org/L...

Attendees are welcome to camp on the grounds. A toilet is available; shower facilities TBD. There's a rustic swimming hole. Kids, guns and NAP-compliant dogs are welcome.

** Bug spray is highly recommended. Bring your own camp chair. Please note: cellular service is unreliable in Grafton. **

For directions, see http://burningporcupi...

Donations are welcome to help cover cost of food.

Hope to see you there!

Libertarian Party of New Hampshire
info@lpnh.org
800-559-LPNH
item.name: LPNH Annual Picnic
